args: Ha ha! AAAAH HA HA HA HA HA!
So does this count as eating humble pie,\nor is it more of a ＂just desserts＂ thing?
You should also consider your role in this,\n{player_name}.
Yes, ma'am. Sorry, ma'am.\nIt was just some innocent fun, ma'am.
I'm not familiar with sylvan customs.\nHow do your people live day-to-day?
Curious about life in the forest, eh?
Well, much of it centers around being\nself-sufficient—hunting and gathering\nand so forth.
Hence your skill with a bow.
That's different from life in the capital.\nIt actually sounds like fun.
Fun, eh? In that case, perhaps the two of\nus should forage for tonight's dinner.
You're a sharp guy—I'm sure you'll pick up\nthe basics in no time.
...I can't believe how much we've found\nin so short a time. Fruit, fish, birds—we\nhave everything we need for a feast!
The key is knowing where things are likely\nto be found, and then how to secure them.
Luckily for you, I happen to be an expert\non both counts.
In that case, do you know if these are\nedible? I found them over there,\nand they looked pretty good.

Technically poisonous, but not especially
harmful. If you happen to consume one,
you'll spend the next hour in a hysterical
laughing fit.
We'll bake some in a pie tonight,\nthen sit back and watch the fun!
Thaaat...doesn't sound like a good idea.
You're right—it sounds like the BEST idea!\nRule one of pranks: if it's funny, do it.
I didn't know the children of the forest\nwere such...children.
Well, to be fair, it's not so much the sylvan\nway as it is mine.
When I fight, I fight with all that I have—\nand when I prank, I prank with equal fury.
Such is the way of Luca!
Heh. I guess that DOES sound like fun.\nMaybe I'll give it a try.
Come learn at the feet of the master,\nyoung grasshopper.
This is going to be great!
...You have to try the Luca Special pie.\nIt's chock-full of the forest's goodness!
I don't know if I have the nerve for this...
It smells delicious. Let's have a tas—
Not just yet! ...Luca, did you sample your\ncreation before giving it to us?
Er... Didn't need to. I know it's great.
Oh, come on! You can't know that for sure!\n...Unless there's some reason you don't\nWAAANT to try it?

What reason, there's no reason, who said
anything at all about a reason?!
...F-fine, then! If you're so suspicious,
I'll just— *chomp* *horf* *nom* *gulp*
There, see? It's deliciou... Deli... Hee.
Eee hee hee... Ha ha! Ahh ha ha ha! Ahhh\nha ha ha ha! AHHH HA HA HA HA HA HA!
AHHHHHHHH HA HA HAAA HA HAAAAA!
He laced the pie. Never trust any baked\ngoods that come from this guy, people!
Er, are you all right, Luca? I mean, not that\nyou have anyone else to blame for this.
...Well, except for me, I suppose.\nI should have stopped you.
Hey, go easy on him! We're both really\nsorreeeee hee hee ha ha!
We're really sor... Eee hee hee hee!\nW-we won't do it ag... Ahh ha ha ha!
P-please, you have to belie...EEE HEE HEE\nAHHH HA HA HA HA HA!
If you think I'm buying that load of bull,\nthere MUST be something in the pie.
